text: Ara ami anusarana kari amara pitrpurusa ibrahima o isahaka o iyakubera dharmamata. Eti amadera jan'ya naya ye amara allahâ€Œra sange kono dharanera ansi damra karaba. Eti amadera prati allahâ€Œra anugraha-pracuryera phale ara manabagosthira prati'o, kintu adhikansa lokera krtajnata prakasa kare na.
